definition: to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
long life/old age/age/life/birthday/funerary
surname Shou

sentences.english: Birthdays may be a more risky time for some older folks, results of a new study suggest.
sentences.chinese: 一項新的研究結果表明，老人在做壽時更易發生危險。

sentences.english: Beijing is to do the whole multi-birthday birthday party, and there is "no Qing Qing nine ten, " said.
sentences.chinese: 北京人做壽多是辦整生日，且有“慶九不慶十”之說。

definition: to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
